name: haveYouSin
description: haveYouSin is a web app on which you can create a to watch list with tv shows and movies using the movie database API v4(https://developers.themoviedb.org/4/getting-started). This app is built with angulars js (1.6), webpack 3.6, ui-router and materialize css framework
author: Purdey Chambraud
